episodes.title: From SSPX to Catholic! (Becoming Catholic from a Cult of extremism)
episodes.description:
From SSPX to Catholic! Kirti shares her story of a going from Hindu to SSPX to Catholic and leaving a cult of extremism. Many views from people in the SSPX are extreme and not Catholic.

episodes.title: A Cult of Catholic Traditionalists (with Patricia Walsh Chadwick)
episodes.description:
We tell the true story of growing up in a cult of Catholic Traditionalists, Patricia Walsh Chadwick tells of her story breaking free from extreme traditionalists of Feenyism. These were radical traditional Catholics, and Fr. Feeney was excommunicated.
